title: Stars transform ahead of Halloween with an array of sexy and spooky costumes
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

As Halloween approaches celebrities have began getting into the spirit for the scariest night on the calendar.

Some have taken inspiration from movies, others from singers and some just use the holiday to slip into something saucy.

Ensuring no detail has been overlooked, famous faces have gone all out with their hair, make-up and outfits to ensure they have attention-grabbing ensembles to strike fear and some have opted to seduce.

Pulling of their spookiest and sexiest looks the stars have shared their transformations on social media for their fans to see.

(Image: Instagram)

Elizabeth Hurley

Actress Elizabeth Hurley, 54, took inspiration from the silver screen for her Halloween look.

The age-defying beauty slipped her toned physique into a yellow PVC catsuit in order to emulate Uma Thurman's character of The Bride in Quentin Tarantino's Kill Bill.

Flashing a glimpse of her ample cleavage, the Bedazzled actress unzipped the front of the bright all in one so her bust could be seen.

Channeling the assassin, Liz ensured she donned a honey-hued wig and carried a fake machete knife.

The elegant beauty kept her ensemble sexy by wearing a face of make-up and there was not a drop of blood in sight!

(Image: Instagram)

Tommy Fury

Love Island's Tommy Fury, 20, ensured he gave his fans a fright as he shunned his handsome looks to become a hairy werewolf.

The teen wolf look was completed with prosthetics applied onto his face which changed his nose into a snout.

He went from Fury to furry as tufts of hair were tuck around his face and he also sported a wig.

Proving no detail was overlooked, the athlete also wore a set of false teeth that were pointy and sharp - very different to his usual gleaming white smile.

(Image: Instagram)

Jacqueline Jossa

Former EastEnders actress Jacqueline Jossa was unrecognisable as she dressed up ahead of the ghastly event.

Jacqueline, 27, transformed into witch Elphaba from Broadway and West End musical Wicked.

Pulling out all the stops, the star painted her body green to mimic the look of Wicked Witch of the West from the famous show.

The mother-of-two covered her caramel locks under a raven wig and as to be expected wore a black witches hat.

She teamed every point accessory with a black gown that featured large fluted sleeves and a black diamante detail around her waist.

(Image: Instagram)

Kem Cetinay

Love Island's Kem Cetinay, 23, seemed to get his Halloween costume idea from a recent trip to the cinema as he overhauled his image to turn into the Joker.

The DC comics character's garb is worlds away from Kem's usual designer garments but the TV presenter managed to pull off a look worthy of being in a blockbuster.

The former Dancing On Ice contestant wore a painted face that resembled a clown - just like the character - and coloured his brown locks a mossy green.

Kem wore an outlandish red suit paired with a gold waistcoat and black shirt.

(Image: Instagram)

Holly Hagan

Geordie Shore's Holly Hagan, 27, decided on a super sexy look for her night celebrating Halloween.

She copied singer Christina Aguilera's style from the Lady Marmalade video that starred in the soundtrack to Baz Luhrmann 's Moulin Rouge!

The beauty made sure her killer curves took centre stage as she poured herself into a read leather bustier and black tutu skirt.

The bombshell slipped her hands into red leather gloves that reached up her forearms and decorated her neck with a diamante choker.

Copying Chritina's look, she crimped her hair into a voluminous style which was coloured with violet slices and wore an elaborate gem encrusted headband.

Holly's face matched that of the Dirtty hitmaker's in the iconic video as she had a dusting of purple shadow across her eyes and a red pout.

(Image: Getty Images)

Laura Anderson

Love Island's Laura Anderson , 30, paraded around as a plucky peacock for her spooky celebrations.

The former air hostess wowed in a black corset covered in gems and feathers and an elaborate headpiece deocrated with emerald and cobalt peacock feathers.

Laura enhanced her sizzling look by wearing sexy stockings and suspenders.

The blonde's face was coated in glitter and coloured paint to giver her costume extra pezazz.

(Image: Instagram)

Olivia Attwood

TOWIE's Olivia Attwood , 28, kept her spooky look simple.

The reality TV star showcased her long legs in a black leather bodysuit and fishnet tights.

Revealing what she was - she placed a set of cat ears atop of her golden crimped mane.

Giving her ensemble a scary touch, the former Love Island cast member has splashes of fake blood on her face and up her arms.

If this is a taste of what is to come we cannot wait to see what the stars pull out in the name of Halloween later this week!
description: The big night may not be until Thursday but a host of celebrities have already raided their fancy dress boxes
